name: Nice Move - Prototype
description:
Description

A prototype used to explore different approaches / engines for HTML5 games. This was made using Construct 2.  The goal was the experiment with the Box2D physics. Can be played on desktop or browser.

All art and code created is my own.  More professional HTML5 games can be found games in my portfolio.

Instructions

  • tap or click blocks on the left side of the screen and move them to the right
  • blocks on the right side of the screen cannot be moved
  • once all blocks are on the right, they must remain stable for a moment before the level is complete, ie. not falling off the screen
  • blocks falling off the screen at any point results in a failure
  • click the grey box to reset the level
